sentences.english: I was gonna call him Slag, but I think he took it as an insult.
sentences.chinese: 我本來想叫他鐵渣的，但似乎他認爲那是個蔑稱。

sentences.english: But Japanese used this word to disdain China in modern times.
sentences.chinese: 但是，近代以來，日本人把這一詞彙用於蔑稱中國。

sentences.english: An offensive term for a black nursemaid in the southern u. s…
sentences.chinese: 在美國南部對布萊克育嬰女傭的蔑稱。
